message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to own this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
Thank you for offering the product at $12000, Alice. While I appreciate the value of the item, I believe $10000 would be a fair price for me to purchase it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking to get a better price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11000. This is a fair compromise, considering the value I've put into the product.
